refnamediv.refpurpose: Use XML Parser within an object

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: This function allows to use parser inside object. All callback functions could be set with xml_set_element_handler etc and assumed to be methods of object.
refsect1.programlisting: parser = xml_parser_create(); xml_set_object($this->parser, &$this); xml_set_element_handler($this->parser, "tag_open", "tag_close"); xml_set_character_data_handler($this->parser, "cdata"); } function parse($data) { xml_parse($this->parser, $data); } function tag_open($parser, $tag, $attributes) { var_dump($parser, $tag, $attributes); } function cdata($parser, $cdata) { var_dump($parser, $cdata); } function tag_close($parser, $tag) { var_dump($parser, $tag); } } // end of class xml $xml_parser = new xml(); $xml_parser->parse("PHP"); ?>
